column4: is samba required to have access to a printer on a winxp machine or just cups?
ive been scouring google and a few forums about it, but dont really know what i need
alright, im lying, ive been at band practice for the last 3 hours and my ears are ringing but...
afaik, winxp does not use the cups(common unix printing system) - so i should think samba is needed
